name: Musicshake
overview:
Founded in March 2005, Musicshake is the world’s most fun and sophisticated online music community, allowing people to CREATE, LISTEN, DISCOVER and SHARE originally-created music. Musicshake provides a platform for non-artists to select from 1.3 million original music samples to create their original music, share and connect across the globe and also provide a way to monetize.

Based in Los Angeles, the Musicshake team includes veterans and experts from the music, technology and entertainment industry. They continue to innovate with the promise to deliver the best user experience to both Musicshake application and the website.
